definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: We have TIGER Balm for mosquito bites.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里有治疗蚊虫叮咬的虎牌清凉油。

sentences.english: Remember to bring some more cool and refreshing oil, otherwise you will regret.
sentences.chinese: 记得要多带一些清凉油，否则你会很遗憾的。

definition: essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant
perfumed toilet water/eau de cologne/floral water/hydrosol
Jintan mouth refresher lozenge, produced by Morishita Jintan company from 1905
to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
